skills.name: Gamma-Ray Burst
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 16s] An underground blaze erupts and explodes near wielder, dealing 1,200% + 200% ATK of Fire DMG and inflicting Flared state lasting 10s on hit. Flared enemies take 20.0% bonus Fire DMG. Spina Astera equip bonus: Astral Flare deals 15% ATK of bonus Fire DMG on Flared enemies.

skills.name: Neutron Degeneracy
skills.description:
Basic, Charged, and Combo ATK deal 25.0% bonus Total DMG to Flared enemies.
Spina Astera equip bonus: She restores 20 Astrum per second when on standby.

skills.name: Relativistic Jets
skills.description: Charged ATK deals 20.0% bonus Total DMG. Spina Astera equip bonus: Charged ATK or Ultimate boosts her Fire DMG by 25.0% for 10s, during which Basic, Charged, and Combo ATK inflict Flared state lasting 10s on hit.
